dissertationData.dissertationTitle: Flow chemistry w syntezie inhibitorów kinaz. Optymalizacja procesu i powiększanie skali.
dissertationData.additionalInfo:
A1. Michałek, S.; Gurba-Bryśkiewicz, L.; Maruszak, W.; Zagozda, M.; Maj, A.M.; Ochal, Z.; Dubiel, K.; Wieczorek, M.; The design of experiments (DoE) in optimization of an aerobic
flow Pd-catalyzed oxidation of alcohol towards an important aldehyde precursor in the synthesis of phosphatidylinositide 3-kinase inhibitor (CPL302415), RSC Advances, 2022,
12, 33605-33611 (IF=4,036), DOI:10.1039/D2RA07003K
